description: Enable Dynamic Data Exchange protocol (DDE) in all supported editions of Microsoft Word or Excel. Author: frack113. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Enable Microsoft Dynamic Data Exchange
query: (winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Word\\Security\\AllowDDE AND winlog.event_data.Details:("DWORD\ \(0x00000001\)" OR "DWORD\ \(0x00000002\)")) OR (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Excel\\Security\\DisableDDEServerLaunch OR *\\Excel\\Security\\DisableDDEServerLookup) AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000000\)")))
